CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 8 - Right to respect for private and family life (Article 8-1 - Respect for family life)
JUDGES: Branko Lubarda;Dmitry Dedov;Georgios A. Serghides;Helen Keller;Helena Jäderblom;Pere Pastor Vilanova
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
CARDINAL . In DATE she married PERSON The couple settled in GPE .
CARDINAL . On DATE and CARDINAL DATE the applicant gave birth to CARDINAL children , a son and a daughter respectively .
CARDINAL . NORP In DATE she and ORG decided to separate .
CARDINAL . On DATE PERSON took the children to GPE without the applicant knowing . He left them with his parents ( the paternal grandparents ) and went back to GPE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the marriage between the applicant and ORG was dissolved .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant applied to the Izmaylovskiy ORG of GPE ( “ the ORG ” ) for a residence order in respect of the children . She also applied for child maintenance from ORG

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG decided that the children should reside with their mother , the applicant . It further ordered ORG to return the children to her and pay child maintenance . The judgment became final on DATE .
CARDINAL . NORP However , ORG refused to comply with the judgment .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG issued a writ of execution .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG in GPE refused to institute enforcement proceedings since the debtor , ORG , resided in GPE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the Izmaylovskiy ORG in GPE opened enforcement proceedings .
CARDINAL . On DATE the enforcement proceedings were transferred to ORG in GPE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant challenged the lawfulness of the above - mentioned decision before ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG found the decision of DATE to be unlawful .

CARDINAL . Meanwhile , on DATE , DATE , DATE and DATE a bailiff from ORG tried to enforce the judgment of DATE without success : on DATE and DATE due to the emotional state of the children , on DATE because the children were outside the territory of GPE , and on DATE because the applicant was absent .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant challenged in court the lawfulness of the bailiffs’ actions during the attempt to return the children to her on DATE , in particular : involvement of the wrong district childcare authority in the enforcement , refusal of a request by her to have the enforcement filmed , refusal to examine an objection by her concerning a psychologist participating in the enforcement , delay in notification of the enforcement , establishment during the enforcement of the applicant ’s son ’s preferences as to his future living arrangements , as well as the bailiffs’ inaction resulting in the failure to secure enforcement of the judgment of DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of GPE found the bailiffs’ actions during the attempt to return the children to the applicant on DATE to be unlawful .
CARDINAL . On DATE a bailiff from ORG restricted ORG travel within GPE for DATE .

CARDINAL . Meanwhile , according to the Government , on DATE , DATE , an unspecified date in DATE , DATE and CARDINAL DATE a bailiff from ORG informed the applicant that the enforcement was scheduled for DATE , DATE , DATE , DATE and DATE respectively . On each of the CARDINAL occasions ORG took the children to the LOC of ORG . However , since neither the applicant nor her representative were present , the enforcement could not take place .
CARDINAL . According to the applicant , she was never informed of the enforcement dates scheduled for DATE , CARDINAL DATE , CARDINAL DATE , CARDINAL DATE and CARDINAL DATE .

CARDINAL . It appears from the case file that the notification of DATE was sent to ORG address . The notifications of DATE and CARDINAL DATE were sent to the applicant ’s address , though there is no evidence to suggest that she received them . The case file contains no evidence that she was notified of the other CARDINAL scheduled dates for carrying out the enforcement measures either .
CARDINAL . On DATE the enforcement file was returned to the Izmaylovskiy ORG in GPE pursuant to the decision of ORG of DATE ( see paragraph CARDINAL above ) .

CARDINAL . On DATE and DATE a bailiff from LOC in GPE ordered ORG to comply with the judgment of DATE by DATE and DATE respectively . He further visited ORG at his place of residence in GPE . It was established that the children were living with ORG parents in GPE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the deputy chief bailiff of ORG imposed an administrative fine on ORG ) for failure to comply with the judgment of CARDINAL DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE a bailiff from the Izmaylovskiy ORG invited ORG to the bailiffs’ office on DATE to provide explanations for his non - compliance with the judgment of DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the bailiff imposed an execution fee on LAW for failure to comply with the judgment of DATE . He was ordered to comply by CARDINAL DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the deputy chief bailiff of ORG imposed a further administrative fine on LAW for failure to comply with the judgment of DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the chief bailiff of LOC imposed an administrative fine on LAW for failure to comply with the lawful demands of the bailiffs .
CARDINAL . On DATE the Commission for the Affairs of Minors and ORG in GPE imposed an administrative fine on LAW .

CARDINAL . On DATE the bailiff temporarily restricted ORG travel in view of his failure to comply with the judgment of CARDINAL DATE , and ordered him to pay the imposed administrative fines . ORG was invited to the bailiffs’ office on DATE to provide explanations for his reluctance to comply with the judgment of DATE , and was ordered to comply by DATE .
CARDINAL . At the applicant ’s request , on CARDINAL DATE the bailiff launched a search for the children and restricted ORG right to drive .
CARDINAL . On DATE the chief bailiff of ORG imposed an administrative fine on LAW for failure to comply with the lawful demands of the bailiffs .
CARDINAL . On DATE the bailiff telephoned PERSON and asked him to attend the bailiffs’ office to provide explanations for his non - compliance with the judgment of DATE . He refused to do so .
CARDINAL . On DATE the bailiff suspended the enforcement proceedings .

CARDINAL . According to the Government , on CARDINAL DATE the bailiff informed the applicant that the enforcement was scheduled for TIME on DATE at the children ’s place of residence in GPE . However , since she failed to attend , the enforcement could not be carried out .
CARDINAL . According to the applicant , she was not informed of the enforcement scheduled for CARDINAL DATE .
CARDINAL . It appears from the case file that the notification of CARDINAL DATE was sent to ORG address .
CARDINAL . The judgment of DATE remains unenforced to date . The children continue to live with their paternal grandparents in GPE .
